entry.title: RT by @wasei_jj: #cyberialayer4 's rly good‚ô•Ô∏è'Memory is Just a Record' is my favorite!! It reminds me of the Invaders mix on FBA, which solid af, + 'Distortion', 'MEMEX', and 'Goodnight, Navi'. It's nostalgic of the early 00s industrial techno that i grew up with, but it still sounds fresh too.
